articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 
Jake Chervinsky: "Crypto people shouldn't support Elon buying Twitter because centralization" 🙄
Meh. It's already a centralized company. Elon buying it doesn't stop anyone from building decentralized alternatives. It might make Twitter better.
Liking crypto doesn't mean hating everything else.
articles.title: Re

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 
banteg: It's sad freedom of speech has so few friends we have to rely on the benevolence and principles of a few tech billionaires like Durov and Musk.
Hope we can do better one day, but for now I welcome our new Twitter overlords.

Re 
Dr. Parik Patel, BA, CFA, ACCA Esq. (drpatel.eth): For $43 billion Elon Musk could’ve given every person in the world a million dollars and still had $37 billion left over.
Instead he decided to buy Twitter.
Shameful.

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 2/ Members of the community are asking for improved security from the NFT collection
teakay.eth {313}: @BoredApeYC Getting your Discord hacked should've been a lesson. Can you guys please reset all pws, add some 2-factor and take better care of this across all social?
This is irresponsible, you're not a small project. 
You're risking your community's money at this point.
articles.title: Re 2/ Members of the community are asking for improved security from the NFT collection
